comments.body:
TMW already have this condition.
Right click the icon
Conditions->Resources->Combo Points

Edited May 5, 2011

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

OP:

Quote from Archont1978:

I'd just want an icon showing how many combo point I've got atm. :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Upon further consideration, I have decided not to create a "text icon" icon type, as it would go against the core of TMW: an addon that displays icon. There are many combo point tracking mods out there, though, including http://wow.curse.com/downloads/wow-addons/details/combo-points-redux.aspx which sounds like it might be what you are looking for.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
